column5: Hi everyone this is newfieman I'm new to the site. I have heard lots of good things about it from my friend fishing fool. Just this year I started to really get back into fishing and I guess you could say I'm hooked.  I just bought a new 16' legend extreme and I try to get out every weekend with my buddy fishing fool. So far this spring we have done well on Balsome for crappie and Dalrymple.  The weekend of the 20th I have booked a cottage on pigon lake with the family and l am looking forward to fishing the lake for the first time.  Looking forward to chat Newfieman.{james}

Ah we be growing strong here me bye. Good to have ya abord. We got a few of them french speak,n guys here,but they be ok in my books. I look forward to some of dat home town humor/lingo.LOL Welcome me ducky.
Welcome to the site. Best of luck fishing up at Pigon Lake, be sure to take and post lot's of pictures!!

Welcome to the board!  I'm sure this will become as addicting as fishing does.  Good thing my boss doesn't check up on this site, or I'd be in big trouble....  Looking forward to seeing some of your reports....and remember....take your camera with you!
I've got a big box full of newfie jokes somewhere.  I'll go look for them.  Welcome aboard!

Hey James, glad to see you finally got here. You will like it on this site, lots of info and plenty of pics and the people will answer all your questions (no women or politics questions though) lol Check out the classifieds for the downrigger and baitcasters you are looking for. Sorry you missed the action on Balsam today, we did pretty well. Kept one under the slot and one over which was 25 1/2" I caught about 6 in the 18" range and Greg did about the same. We were rippin Bucktails through the weeds. Sorry, left my camera at home.  We'll hook up next weekend!!  Stan
Another newf......sweet!! Where abouts are ya from on the rock? I'm off the northern peninsula myself....St. Anthony area.  Welcome aboard!  Sinker
Welcome to the board! Look forward to your reports from Pigeon! Good Luck!
....Welcome Newf, hope you have a great season in your new ride.
welcome to the board, please remember we like lots of pictures with a good story.
Hows it gettin' on?  Welcome to OFC Skipper.
OH god... not another one... I figgered we fulfilled our newf quota already... geez..  oh well as long as you're here... welcome aboard...  maybe they will stop makin' fun of me now... (unlikely)
Welcome to the board. As fishnifool says they are a good bunch of guys....can't speak for myself though....
lard tunderin jeziz by..cooks yourselves up a nice jig's dinner and get in on the action

welcome newfie. I am new on here too and this board has been very gebrous with sharing their Experience and Knowledge with my daughter (botbot) and myself. I look forward to seeing your first fishing reports.  splashhopper
